OOC: I thought we agreed to let the missiles hit.  Oh
well I guess both happened over the course of a minute
or two.

--- warriorazure <wingedwarrior41@...> wrote:
> OOC: Kyle, you should think about your posts. Your
> are on the verge of 
> moding. You can only state your char attemps to do
> an action against 
> another one, not Say he succeeds at it without the
> consent of the 
> other player. I understand that Warhead is in stasis
> lock, so I'll let 
> this pass for now. Besides, the preds can just build
> a new head!
> 
> BIC: The decapitated predacon lies on the
> ground(what else would you 
> want? =P). 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., Kyle Stewart <dewboy30816@y...>
> wrote:
> > Sunhawk swoops down and transforms.  He cuts off
> > Warhead's head and gives it to Kup.
> > 
> > Sunhawk:  Without this they can't revive him, now
> get
> > back to base.  I'll hold Megatron off long enough
> for
> > you to get a head start and then if no
> reinforcements
> > arrive I'l get out of here. NOW GO!
> > 
> > He fires 8 shots at Megatron (laser).
> > 
> > --- warriorazure <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> > > OOC: Yeah, just bring Warhead back and he should
> be
> > > fine.
> > > 
> > > Bic: Warhead was still lying on the ground in a
> > > stasis lock.
> > > 
> > > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "x_rauq_x" <x_rauq_x@y...>
> > > wrote:
> > > > If that's what you like to do, then perhaps
> you
> > > should do it, and 
> > > > not otherwise. At the moment, you didn't post
> for
> > > dodging Megatron's 
> > > > attack, Sunhawk grabbed Megatron and put him
> into
> > > a headlock, and 
> > > > then turned him around to face Kup's
> weaponfire.
> > > THAT is what's 
> > > > wrong. You should be posting that Sunhawks
> tries
> > > to grab Megatron to 
> > > > put him into a headlock, not that he suddenly
> has
> > > him in a headlock. 
> > > > =)
> > > > 
> > > > Cause talking ooc style is delaying Megatron,
> I'm
> > > going to just go 
> > > > with that you've done. I'm not sure that Azure
> > > wants Warhead dead, 
> > > > so Megatron is going to just try to run with
> > > Warhead. Heh, he's got 
> > > > the whole maximal base running him down right
> now
> > > eh. =P
> > > > 
> > > > -- Megatron --
> > > > 
> > > > Megatron's axe swishes harmlessly past
> Sunhawk's
> > > side. The over 
> > > > powered swing allows Sunhawk to grapple him,
> and
> > > get him into a 
> > > > headlock.
> > > > 
> > > > "Hah, a headlock?!" Megatron gets hit by one
> of
> > > Kup's shots, a char 
> > > > mark appears on his back armour, then he grabs
> for
> > > Sunhawk's legs, 
> > > > attempting to try to throw him at Kup, along
> with
> > > a plasma blast. 
> > > > (he's going to throw Sunhawk and try to hit
> him
> > > with a plasma blast 
> > > > after the throw)
> > > > 
> > > > 
> > > > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "dewboy30816"
> > > <dewboy30816@y...> wrote:
> > > > > Here's how I like to do it.  I post what he
> > > attempts, you can 
> > > > > intercept.  If you intercept his attempts
> (start
> > > your own post) 
> > > > > halfway though, everything after that is
> null,
> > > and void.
> > > > > 
> > > > > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "x_rauq_x"
> <x_rauq_x@y...>
> > > wrote:
> > > > > > Watch your posting, if you want something
> to
> > > happen to Megatron, 
> > > > > you 
> > > > > > have to attempt to do it, not just do it.
> (aka
> > > moding) So,
